Articles.Content: Minmus

God I will science the .... out of your mod when it comes!

Can't wait to use those shiny new cool procedural PQS mods for my pack!

these aren't new pqs mods, amarius. They are the stock standard ones. There's nothing too special about this pack in terms of things it adds...because it actually adds nothing, just a few scaledspace textures.! Everything I've done so far is doable by anyone, at any time.
Yep gotta be minmus next to kerbin. GD that eeloo pic look soooooo gorgeous. WOW

ok eeloo was a little easy....how about this?

http://i.imgur.com/5Hr0Icl.png

That looks like Minmus, but more importantly, since when did Kerbin get three moons?
Dres is one of kerbins moons now.

well things have wrapped up nicely today, got a LOT of work done tying up loose ends. Very likely I'll be able to get some sort of an early version release very soon...although i WOULD like to get science integration done, but that might take a while! Here's hoping I get more done tomorrow then things will be nice and polished!

almost forgot....Eelo was the cratered one, yes! Also yes Minmus was the last pic i posted...looks like you guys really have been playing attention to the development of this pack lol!

ok so the pack is ready for a release. HOWEVER there are a few little things i would like to get sorted before it happens, namely biome maps & science multipliers. ScieDefs can wait until another time, but i feel career integration is pretty essential to me.

Guess the planet!

Incidentally, one of the bugs that needs fixing is making Kerbin's SOI not insanely small (so that Mun and Dres are actually inside the SOI). This can of course be done two ways. One is making the Sun smaller to match the planet's closer orbit (and its orange dwarf description). Two is by forcing the SOI size (which would be unrealistic as Dres and Mun would not actually lie within Kerbin's hill sphere and would still orbit it). There is also a third option: make the planets further away again.
